resources.string: "Na\'urar dasa bayanai na shirin hade zance"
"Ana sanya bayanan murya a kan ma\'adanar USB."
"Ana sanya bayanan murya a kan SD card."

"An kasa sanya bayanan murya. Tabbatar SD card dinka yana cikin na\'urarka sannan yana da sarari da ba komai na akalla Megabayit 6. In dama katinka yana cikin na\'urarka, gwada cire katin sannan ka sake mayar da shi."
"The voice data failed to install. Please make sure your USB storage has at least 6MB of free space."

"An kasa sanya bayanan murya. Tabbatar SD card dinka yana cikin na\'urarka sannan yana da sarari da ba komai na akalla Megabayit 6. In dama katinka yana cikin na\'urarka, gwada cire katin sannan ka sake mayar da shi."
